nodes.name: Safe Block in the Middle of the Room

enemies.groupName: Red Brinstar Fireflea Room Left Yapping Maws
Red Brinstar Fireflea Room Right Yapping Maw

reusableRoomwideNotable.name: Red Brinstar Firefleas Ceiling Bomb Jump
reusableRoomwideNotable.note: This is a very long ceiling bomb jump.

strats.name: Leave with Spark (X-Mode)
note: Use the Spikes in the center of the room to build a Shinespark with X-Mode.
There are sections of the room where using more complex movement can be used to save a Spike hit when X-Moding.
strats.devNote: Two spike hits are expected per attempt (with any additional leniency hits being multiplied by this amount).

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Waver
strats.note: It takes 30 seconds after room entry to get hit by a Waver. It is the second Waver that comes nearby.

strats.name: G-Mode Regain Mobility
strats.note: Wait 30 seconds for a Waver to come and hit Samus. It is the second Waver that will hit her.

strats.name: Leave With Grapple Teleport
note: Moonwalk into the transition on the same frame that the Grapple Beam reaches the Grapple block.
Continue holding Grapple through the door transition to initiate a teleport in the next room.
devNote: FIXME: Strats could be added which come in shinecharging or shinecharged, and leave with both a grapple teleport and a shinecharge.
Currently we don't have a way to represent this in the schema, as having multiple exit conditions is not allowed, but this could be relaxed in the future.

strats.name: Shinespark (Come In With Spark)
strats.note: Enter the door high to avoid a frame perfect spike hit.
devNote: FIXME: There is one frame where ending the spark early puts you over spikes with no avoiding them, unless you entered the room at top of door.
Which frame is determined by actual shinesparkFrames and shinespark velocity.

strats.name: Shinespark (Come In Shinecharging)
strats.devNote: FIXME: Could be doable tankless if the shinecharge happened in the previous room and then Samus ran out with more speed.

strats.name: X-Ray Exit Damage Boost
note: If you wait long enough, a Waver will arrive. After it turns around to go back to the right, damage boost off of it, then follow it.
Continue to hit it to get i-frames to avoid taking damage from any spikes.
The amount of Waver hits can be reduced by running ahead on the spikes and taking damage from a second Waver instead of following the first Waver.

strats.name: X-Ray Exit Spike Floor
strats.note: This strat is simply running and jumping across the spikes.

strats.name: Red Brinstar Firefleas Ceiling Bomb Jump
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Red Brinstar Firefleas Ceiling Bomb Jump
note: This is a very long ceiling bomb jump.
Wait for the Wavers to come and kill them before crossing the room.

strats.name: Red Brinstar Firefleas Ceiling Bomb Jump (Artificial Morph)
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Red Brinstar Firefleas Ceiling Bomb Jump
note: This is a very long ceiling bomb jump.
Crossing the room with artificial morph is particularly difficult without a good way to kill the Wavers.

strats.name: Shinespark (Come in Shinecharging)
devNote: FIXME: With canShinesparkMovement you can move left a bit further before sparking, but it may not be worth modeling.

strats.name: Shinespark (In-Room Runway)
strats.note: Use the really small runway in the pit in the middle of the room.

strats.name: Leave With Spark (In-Room Runway)
strats.note: Use the really small runway in the pit in the middle of the room. The door must be already opened.
strats.devNote: Unlocking the door is free since obstacle A being cleared implies it was already unlocked earlier if needed.

strats.name: Shinespark (X-Mode)
note: Jump from the runway near the right door to bounce onto spikes for X-Mode.
Store a spark in X-Mode and use that to shinepark across the room.
Bumping a solid tile before activating X-Mode will remove dash state, preventing shinecharging.
strats.devNote: Omitting leniency spikeHits, since the firefleas provide an opportunity to farm after a failed attempt.

strats.name: Leave With Spark (X-Mode)
note: Jump from the runway near the right door to bounce onto spikes for X-Mode.
Store a spark in X-Mode and use that to shinepark across the room.
Bumping a solid tile before activating X-Mode will remove dash state, preventing shinecharging.
The left door must have been opened previously, in order to shinespark through it.
devNote: Omitting leniency spikeHits, since the firefleas provide an opportunity to farm after a failed attempt.
Unlocking the door is free since obstacle A being cleared implies it was already unlocked earlier if needed.

strats.name: X-Ray Access Ice Bridge
note: Cross the gaps by freezing multiple enemies or by refreezing a Waver while standing on it.
Be careful running on frozen enemies.
Freeze the final Waver high and walljump up, or wait for the second Waver to come back.

strats.name: X-Ray Access Damage Boost
note: A precise strat that involves crossing both gaps by dboosting off Wavers.
The Wavers are also used for iframes to avoid taking damage from any spikes.

strats.name: Red Brinstar Firefleas Ceiling Bomb Jump
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Red Brinstar Firefleas Ceiling Bomb Jump
strats.note: This is a very long ceiling bomb jump. Kill the Wavers before crossing the room.

strats.name: Red Brinstar Firefleas Ceiling Bomb Jump (Artificial Morph)
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Red Brinstar Firefleas Ceiling Bomb Jump
note: This is a very long ceiling bomb jump.
Crossing the room with artificial morph is particularly difficult without a good way to kill the Wavers.
It is recommended to avoid killing the Firefleas, as the room gets dark fast.

strats.name: Leave With Spark (In-Room Runway)
strats.note: Requires opening the door, then going to the pit in the middle of the room to use the really small runway.

strats.name: Leave Shinecharged (X-Mode)
note: Store a spark in X-Mode and use that to leave with a shinecharge.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Waver
strats.note: It takes 90 seconds after room entry to get hit by a Waver. It is the second Waver that comes nearby.

strats.name: G-Mode Regain Mobility
strats.note: Wait 40 seconds for a Waver to come and hit Samus.

strats.name: Ice and HiJump
strats.note: Use the Fireflea when it moves to the right to cross the first gap.

strats.name: HiJump and Wall Jump
strats.note: Jump from on top of the lower spikes, wall jump on the overhang, and land on the upper spikes.

strats.name: Damage Boost
note: Damage boost off of the Fireflea or a Waver in order to get onto the upper spikes.
It is possible to quickly get into position to use the Waver or to wait for it to return.
It is also possible (but not required in this strat) to perform a second damage boost off of the Wavers to avoid some spike damage.

strats.name: Ice and HiJump
strats.note: Freeze the Waver that gets stuck in the left pit as high as possible in order to avoid a wall jump.

strats.name: X-Ray Access Tricky SpringBall Jump
note: Jump from the safe spot on the spikey stairs and use the momentum change from equipping SpringBall to move closer to the door's platform.
Then SpringBall jump to reach the door.

strats.name: X-Ray Access SpikeJumps with HiJump
note: Jump to the door leading to X-Ray either by jumping from spikes or with a very precise jump.
Cross the room by Jumping atop the spikes.
Taking enemy damage can be used to reduce some spike damage.
The final jump can either be made by jumping from the bottommost spike stair or from the safe stair.
Setup run speed atop the spike stair by holding forward to be pushed backward.
The safe stair jump is much harder, but can be made without every pixel of runway.
